snippet.title: [ModDB] Half-Life WAR: Mod Trailer
snippet.description:
[ModDB] Half-Life WAR: Mod Trailer

Step into the shoes of Tony Snyder, a former Navy Seals operative who just joined T.S.O. - a top-secret worldwide military organization which specializes with espionage, sabotage, infiltration - you name it. A new terrorist threat has been discovered, and they are planning something big. Uncover their secrets and plans as you fight against them and save the day.

ModDB: https://www.moddb.com/mods/half-life-war
-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Mod DB is the world's oldest video game modification community, proudly serving millions of readers monthly who seek creative new gameplay experiences (user generated content). Our aim is to unite developers, players and their ideas, empowering them to shape the games we play through mods. 

Want to submit your own game or mod trailer? Email us at david@dbolical.com!

Links:
https://www.moddb.com/ 
https://twitter.com/ModDB
https://www.facebook.com/ModDB
https://www.youtube.com/c/moddb
-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
